EmailTemplate.subject: Starting in 20 minutes: Stratus Automated Uptime Layer
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STARTING IN 20 MINUTES Stratus Automated Uptime Layer
We hope that you will join us to learn more about how Stratus' Automated Uptime Layer takes the complexity and uncertainty out of the monitoring and management of your most mission-critical applicaitons.
START TIME: 10 AM Pacific / 11 AM Mountain / Noon Central / 1 PM Eastern
DURATION: 1 hour
JOIN LINK: http://tritech.ilinc.com/join/fxmwjhr
AUDIO: Listen through your computer speakers or dial the toll free number on your screen when you log in.
TROUBLE LOGGING IN? Call (800) 799-4510 for the iLinc Support Team Help
Jenny Clavero TriTech Marketing (858) 799-7362 jenny.clavero@tritech.com
Share this message with your colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com
This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems 9860 Mesa Rim Road | San Diego | CA | 92121
